text:
Build Your Own Meal

Step 1: Choose Your Base: Burrito Bowl, Burrito, Quesadilla
Step 2: Rice & Beans: Yellow/Brown Rice with Chickpeas/Black Beans
Step 3: Pick a Protein ($11.99): Butter Chicken, Chicken Tikka, Lamb Curry, Ground Beef, Seasonal Chicken, Paneer Tikka Masala, Chickpea Curry, Shahi Paneer, Black Lentils
Step 4: Fillings: (Details not clear)
Step 5: Sauces and Spices: (Details not clear)
Step 6: Extras or Add-Ons: (Details not clear)
Combos

Chips and Salsa: $2.99
Chips, Salsa, and Drink: $3.99
Chips & Guacamole: $3.99
Chips, Guacamole & Drinks: $4.99
Chips & Queso: $4.99
Chips, Queso and Drink: $5.99

Signature Bowls

Bhangra Bowl: $11.99 - Spiced roasted cauliflower, curried chickpeas, yellow/brown basmati rice, spice, New Delhi slaw, red onions, carrots, street crunch, cilantro, and raita.
Rangila Bowl: $11.99 - Brown/yellow basmati rice, paneer tikka masala curry, kachumber salad, tamarind chutney, street crunch, raita, and cilantro.
Perks of Being Cauliflower: $11.99 - Seasoned Tofu and cauliflower, lemon turmeric rice, cucumber cubes, pumpkin seeds, and cilantro chilli lime dressing.
Mumbai Masala Bowl: $11.99 - Brown/yellow basmati rice, butter chicken curry, red slaw, cucumber, tamarind chutney, sev crunch, and spinach.
New Delhi Bowl: $11.99 - Mutton curry (Lamb curry), turmeric-infused basmati rice, red onions, Green Chutney, lime, and Cilantro.
Tikka Chance on Me: $11.99 - Gluten friendly. Brown/yellow basmati rice, chicken tikka masala curry, corn, kachumber salad, green chutney, raita, and street crunch.
Madras Bowl: $11.99 - Gluten friendly. Brown/yellow basmati rice, chicken Madras curry, red slaw, Pico Kachumber, green chutney, raita, and spicy sev crunch
Pacifica Bowl: $11.99 - Warm quinoa, baby spinach, tomato, carrots, chicken, goat cheese, tortilla chips, cilantro, and avocado. Lime-cilantro jalapeño vinaigrette and goodlife hot sauce.

Salad Menu

Meat Salads
Aphrodite Salad: $11.99 - Mixed greens, strawberries, apple, almonds, mozzarella cheese, cucumbers, and chicken with Raspberry dressing.
Super Food Salad: $11.99 - Mixed greens, chicken, apple, pear, walnut, and cheese with your choice of dressing.
Grain Of Thrones: $11.99 - Mixed greens, chicken, quinoa, corn, avocado, house spice, and pumpkin seeds with your choice of dressing.
District Cobb: $11.99 - Mixed greens, chicken, avocado, corn, red onions, hard boiled egg, tomatoes, house seasoning, blue cheese dressing, and bacon.
Don Quixote: $11.99 - Mixed greens, chicken, avocado, mango, roasted corn, and Jack cheese with your choice of dressing.
Summer Cobb: $11.99 - Chicken, fresh peaches, avocado, corn, goat cheese, pickled red onions, eggs, spring mix, and house seasoning with honey dijon vinaigrette.  
Vibrant Venus: $11.99 - Strawberries, goat cheese crumbles, spinach, chicken, red onions, walnuts, and balsamic vinaigrette.
Vegan Salads
Good Life Salad: $11.99 - Chickpeas, cucumbers, tomatoes, spinach, kale, red onions, and toasted sesame seeds.
Happy Vegan Salad: $11.99 - Spinach, kale, quinoa, carrots, green beans, and edamame.
Protein Bowls

Meat (Non-Veg)
Harvest Bowl: $11.99 - Brown rice or quinoa with lime, topped with chicken, apple, shredded kale, and toasted pumpkin seeds.
Southwest Bowl: $11.99 - Brown rice or quinoa, chicken, spinach, roasted corn, avocado, tomatoes, cheese, and cilantro vinaigrette.
Vegetarian
Hungry Buddha Bowl: $11.99 - Quinoa or brown rice, tofu, spinach, red onions, pumpkin seeds, edamame, carrots, and tahini dressing.
Mediterranean Escape Bowl: $11.99 - Warm chickpeas, warm quinoa, shredded carrots, spinach, raisins, red onions, tomatoes, almonds, jalapenos, olive oil, and cilantro.  
Falafel Radio Bowl: $11.99 - Falafel, pineapple, brown basmati rice, broccoli, kale, shredded carrots, and sesame seeds.

BURRITOS

Hella Vegan Burrito (Vegan): $10.99 - Chickpea curry with rice and pico de gallo layered in a tortilla.
Chicken Club: $11.99 - Chicken tikka, lettuce, shredded cheese, pico de gallo and chipotle ranch dressing layered in a grilled tortilla.
Beef Raider: $11.99 - Seasoned ground beef, yellow basmati rice, black beans, pico de gallo, cheddar cheese, sour cream, and lettuce with your choice of sauce.
Funky Chicken: $11.99 - Butter chicken curry and chicken tikka masala curry with basmati rice, pico de gallo, cheese, walnuts, and raisins.
Masala Mama Burrito: $11.99 - Your choice of chicken or paneer tikka masala, basmati rice, pico kachumber, mango chutney, yogurt, and cilantro.
Jumma Burrito (Butter Chicken Burrito): $11.99 - Butter chicken, rice, pico kachumber, green chutney, raita, and street crunch.
Desi Chicken (Chicken Tikka Masala): $11.99 - Chicken tikka masala, rice, mango chutney, curried chana chickpeas, pico kachumber, and spring leaf mix.
QUESADILLA

Chicken Club: $11.99 - Chicken tikka, lettuce, shredded cheese, pico de gallo and chipotle ranch dressing layered in a grilled tortilla.
New Delhi: $11.99 - Butter chicken curry, basmati rice, pico de gallo, mozzarella cheese and cilantro in a flour tortilla. Served with salsa and sour cream.1  
1.
www.skipthedishes.com
www.skipthedishes.com
Oh Calcutta (Vegetarian): $11.99 - Seasoned Tofu and cauliflower, light spiced vegetables, and mozzarella cheese in a flour tortilla. Served with salsa and sour cream.
Mexico City: $11.99 - Seasoned ground chicken, chorizo, and Monterey Jack and Pico de Gallo in a flour tortilla. Served with salsa and sour cream.
SPECIAL EATS

Desi Butter Chicken Poutine: $12.99 - French fries with cheese, onions, cilantro, and butter chicken.
FIRE on the MOUNTAIN NACHOS: $11.99 - Nachos with queso, ground beef, jalapenos, tomatoes, cilantro, sour cream, guacamole & hot salsa.
Classic Nachos: $11.99 - Tortilla chips topped with beans, creamy queso cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, guacamole, and sliced jalapenos.
PIZZAS

Butter Chicken: $11.99 - Butter chicken cooked in a creamy tomato butter sauce, green peppers & mozzarella.
Chicken Tikka: $11.99 - Chicken cooked in tikka sauce, onions, green peppers, mozzarella and cilantro.
Paneer Tikka: $11.99 - Paneer cooked in tikka sauce, onions, green peppers, mozzarella and cilantro.
name: Goodlife Foods Co
